class.name: BazelCleanStep
class.description: A [bazel clean step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-bazel-plugin) to execute bazel command

function.name: bazelClean
function.description: Adds a [bazel clean step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-bazel-plugin) to execute bazel command @see BazelCleanStep

param.name: teamcity.build.workingDir
param.description: [Build working directory](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/Build+Working+Directory) for script, specify it if it is different from the [checkout directory](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/Build+Checkout+Directory).

param.name: arguments
param.description: Enter additional command line arguments for bazel command.

param.name: startupOptions
param.description: Enter additional options that appear before the bazel command.
